В нём вся моя история, на которую никто не положит глаз, пока она плывёт по течению моря моего сердца, исчезая вместе с морскими водорослями......"

Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): 「以上が、当家のルールです。厳しいですが、当家で躾けられたことが、皆さんの将来にきっと役立つものと信じています。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「以上が、当家のルールです。厳しいですが、当家で躾けられたことが、皆さんの将来にきっと役立つものと信じています」
Russian (RU): "Это все семейные правила. Они строги, но я считаю, что дисциплина, которой вы научитесь в этом доме, хорошо послужит вам в будущем."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Essas são todas as regras da família. Elas podem ser estritas, mas acredito que a disciplina que aprenderão nesta casa servirá também para os seus futuros."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「以上，即是本宅的規矩。雖然很嚴格，但我相信，能在本宅之中受管教，定會有用於諸位的將來。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「以上，即是本宅的规矩。虽然很严格，但我相信，能在本宅之中受管教，定会有用于诸位的将来。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Queste sono tutte le regole della famiglia. Potrebbero essere severe, ma credo che la disciplina che imparerete in questa casa vi potrà servire in futuro."

Steam (ST): """Yes, Madam."""
Umineko Project (UP): """Yes, Madam."""
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
Russian (RU): """Да, мадам."""
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): """Sim, madame."""
Chinese Simplified (CN): [=CHT]
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): """Sì, Madame."""

Steam (ST): The servants who would start working this April all called out in unison.
Umineko Project (UP): The servants who would start working this April all called out in unison.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): この４月より、新しく迎えられた使用人たちが、声を揃える。
Russian (RU): Ответили в унисон все слуги, начинающие работать в апреле этого года.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Os serviçais que começariam a trabalhar em abril responderam todos em conjunto.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 從 4 月開始進府的新傭人們，異口同聲地這般答道。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 从 4 月开始进府的新佣人们，异口同声地这般答道。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Le domestiche che avrebbero iniziato a lavorare questo aprile risposero all'unisono.

Steam (ST): The rules of the Ushiromiya family are no more or less strict than those of the Fukuin House.
Umineko Project (UP): The rules of the Ushiromiya family are no more or less strict than those at the Gospel House.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): The rules of the Ushiromiya family are no more or less strict than those at the Fukuin House.
PC Japanese (JP): 規則が窮屈なのは、福音の家も右代宮家も変わらない。
Russian (RU): Правила семьи Уширомия не менее и не более строги, чем в Доме Фукуин.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): As regras da família Ushiromiya não são mais nem menos rígidas que aquelas da Casa Fukuin.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): “規矩死板嚴格”這點，福音之家也好、右代宮家也罷，均無什麼不同。
Chinese Simplified (CN): “规矩死板严格”这点，福音之家也好、右代宫家也罢，均无什么不同。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Le regole della famiglia Ushiromiya non sono né più, né meno, severe di quelle alla Fukuin House.

Steam (ST): However, we get paid a lot of money here. They also give us a lot of help in finding our next job.
Umineko Project (UP): However, here, we get paid a lot of money.{n}They also give us a lot of help in finding our next job.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): However, here, we get paid a lot of money. They also give us a lot of help in finding our next job.
PC Japanese (JP): しかしここでは、とても大きな給金がもらえる。そして、再就職に当たっては強力なバックアップをしてくれた。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): しかしここでは、とても大きな給金がもらえる。{n}そして、再就職に当たっては強力なバックアップをしてくれた。
Russian (RU): Однако здесь нам много платят.{n}А ещё оказывают большую помощь в поисках следующей работы.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Porém, aqui, nós recebemos muito dinheiro.{n}Eles também nos ajudam muito a encontrarmos o nosso próximo trabalho.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 不過在這，能拿到很高的薪水。{n}並且，在換工作時，右代宮家還會提供強力的後援。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 不过在这，能拿到很高的薪水。{n}并且，在换工作时，右代宫家还会提供强力的后援。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Tuttavia, qui, si è pagati con molto denaro. Ci danno anche molto aiuto nel trovare il nostro prossimo lavoro.

Steam (ST): We work for the Ushiromiya family, store up money, use their influence to get a job at a good company, and start on a new, happy life.
Umineko Project (UP): We work for the Ushiromiya family, store up money, use their influence to get a job at a good company, and start on a new, happy life.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): We work for the Ushiromiya family, store up money, use their influence to get a job at a good company, and start on a new, happy life.
PC Japanese (JP): 右代宮家で働き、お金を貯めて、良い会社に就職を斡旋してもらい、新しい幸せな人生を切り拓く。
Russian (RU): Мы работаем на семью Уширомия, копим деньги, с помощью их влияния получаем работу в хорошей компании и начинаем новую, счастливую жизнь.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Nós trabalhamos para a família Ushiromiya, juntamos dinheiro, usamos a influência deles para conseguir emprego em uma boa empresa e começamos uma nova vida feliz.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 在右代宮家工作，存錢，經他們介紹，去好公司上班，開拓新的幸福人生。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 在右代宫家工作，存钱，经他们介绍，去好公司上班，开拓新的幸福人生。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Lavoriamo per la famiglia Ushiromiya, mettiamo denaro da parte, usiamo la loro influenza per trovare un buon lavoro in una buona compagnia, e iniziamo una nuova, allegra vita.

Steam (ST): ...That was the dream, and it was a very realistic one, held by all of us at the Fukuin House.
Umineko Project (UP): ......That was the dream, and it was a very realistic one, held by all of us at the Gospel House.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): ......That was the dream, and it was a very realistic one, held by all of us at the Fukuin House.
PC Japanese (JP): ……それが福音の家のみんなが描く、もっとも現実的な夢だった。
Russian (RU): ......Такова была наша реалистичная мечта, хранимая всеми в Доме Фукуин.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......Este era o sonho, e era um sonho muito realista, mantido por todos nós da Casa Fukuin.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……這是福音之家每一個孩子都在描繪著的，最最現實的夢想。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ……这是福音之家每一个孩子都在描绘着的，最最现实的梦想。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Quello era il sogno, ed era molto realistico, appartenente a tutti noi della Fukuin House.

Steam (ST): However, not everyone can become an Ushiromiya family servant. Only kids with a record of exemplary conduct and good grades are recommended.
Umineko Project (UP): However, not everyone can become an Ushiromiya family servant.{n}Only kids with a record of exemplary conduct and good grades are recommended.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): However, not everyone can become an Ushiromiya family servant. Only kids with a record of exemplary conduct and good grades are recommended.
PC Japanese (JP): しかし、誰もが右代宮家の使用人になれるわけではない。品行方正で成績優秀な子しか、推薦はされない。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): しかし、誰もが右代宮家の使用人になれるわけではない。{n}品行方正で成績優秀な子しか、推薦はされない。
Russian (RU): Но стать слугой семьи Уширомия может не каждый.{n}Рекомендуются только дети с примерным поведением и хорошими оценками.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Mas nem todo mundo se torna um serviçal da família Ushiromiya.{n}Apenas crianças com recordes de conduta exemplar e boas notas recebem a recomendação.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 然而，並不是人人都能去當右代宮家的傭人的。{n}只有品行端正，成績優秀的孩子，才能得到推薦。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 然而，并不是人人都能去当右代宫家的佣人的。{n}只有品行端正，成绩优秀的孩子，才能得到推荐。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Però, non tutti possono diventare domestici della famiglia Ushiromiya. {n}Solo persone con un record di condotta esemplare e buoni voti sono raccomandate.

Steam (ST): So, all of the kids who want to be sure of leaving the Fukuin House to live a happy life are feverishly devoted to their studies...
Umineko Project (UP): So, all of the kids who want to be sure of leaving the Gospel House to live a happy life are feverishly devoted to their studies......
Original Witch Hunt (OG): So, all of the kids who want to be sure of leaving the Fukuin House to live a happy life are feverishly devoted to their studies......
PC Japanese (JP): なので、絶対に福音の家を出て行って幸せになってやると願う子たちは、皆、熱心に勉強を励んでいた……。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): なので、絶対に福音の家を出て行って幸せになってやると願う子たちは、皆、熱心に勉強に励んでいた……。
Russian (RU): Поэтому все дети, желающие зажить счастливой жизнью после того, как покинут Дом Фукуин, лихорадочно посвящают себя учёбе......
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Por isso, todas as crianças que queriam ter certeza que deixariam a Casa Fukuin para viver uma vida feliz, se devotavam febrilmente aos seus estudos......
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 因此，一心想著“絕對要走出福音之家，獲得幸福”的孩子，全都在用功刻苦學習……。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 因此，一心想着“绝对要走出福音之家，获得幸福”的孩子，全都在用功刻苦学习……。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Quindi, tutti coloro che vogliono avere la sicurezza di lasciare la Fukuin House per vivere una vita felice sono febbrilmente devoti ai loro studi...

Speaker: Ushiromiya Natsuhi
Steam (ST): "That's enough for today. Tomorrow, you start early. Make sure the lights are all out at the appropriate time. That is all."
Umineko Project (UP): "That's enough for today. Tomorrow, you start early. Make sure the lights are all out at the appropriate time. That is all."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): 「では、これで今日はおしまいです。明日からは早いですよ。消灯時間を守るように。解散。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「では、これで今日はおしまいです。明日からは早いですよ。消灯時間を守るように。解散」
Russian (RU): "На сегодня достаточно. Завтра вы начинаете рано. Не забудьте вовремя погасить свет. Можете идти."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Chega por hoje. Amanhã começaremos cedo. Tratem de apagar as luzes no horário indicado. Isso é tudo."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「那麼，今天就到此結束。從明天開始得早起。請大家謹守熄燈時間。解散。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「那么，今天就到此结束。从明天开始得早起。请大家谨守熄灯时间。解散。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "È abbastanza per oggi. Domani, iniziate presto. Fate in modo che le luci siano tutte spente all'ora appropriata. È tutto."

Steam (ST): """Yes, Madam. Thank you very much."""
Umineko Project (UP): """Yes, Madam. Thank you very much."""
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): 「「「はい、奥様。ありがとうございます。」」」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「「「はい、奥様。ありがとうございます」」」
Russian (RU): """Да, мадам. Большое спасибо."""
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): """Sim, madame. Somos muito gratos."""
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「「「是，太太。非常感謝。」」」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「「「是，太太。非常感谢。」」」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): """Sì, Madame. Grazie molte."""

Steam (ST): After bowing until Natsuhi was no longer in sight, the new servants all followed the lead of one of the more experienced servants and raised their heads.
Umineko Project (UP): After bowing until Natsuhi was no longer in sight, the new servants all followed the lead of one of the more experienced servants and raised their heads.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): 夏妃の姿が見えなくなるまで頭を下げ続けていた新しい使用人たちは、先輩使用人が頭を上げたのに倣い、頭を上げる。
Russian (RU): После поклона Нацухи до самого её ухода все новые слуги последовали примеру более опытной слуги и подняли головы.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Após se curvarem até que Natsuhi sumisse de vista, os novos serviçais seguiram as instruções dos serviçais mais experientes e ergueram suas cabeças.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 直至看不到夏妃的身影後，一直低著頭的新傭人們，才照前輩傭人抬頭的樣，抬起了頭來。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 直至看不到夏妃的身影后，一直低着头的新佣人们，才照前辈佣人抬头的样，抬起了头来。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Dopo essersi inchinate finché Natsuhi non era più in vista, le nuove domestiche seguirono tutte la guida di una delle più esperte e alzarono le loro teste.

Steam (ST): "Okay, we're done for the day. Starting tomorrow, you'll be following your shift schedule. The Madam is very strict about time. If any of you sleep in, it'll be my responsibility. So if you do, I'll kick you awake. Got it?!"
Umineko Project (UP): "Okay, we're done for the day. Starting tomorrow, you'll be following your shift schedule. Madam is very strict about time. If any of you sleep in, it'll be my responsibility. So if you do, I'll kick you awake. Got it?!"
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "Okay, we're done for the day. Starting tomorrow, you'll be following your shift schedule. The Madam is very strict about time. If any of you sleep in, it'll be my responsibility. So if you do, I'll kick you awake. Got it?!"
PC Japanese (JP): 「じゃあ、今日はこれでおしまいよ。明日からはシフト通り。奥様は時間に厳しい方よ。あんたらが寝坊したら私の責任にされるわ。寝坊したら蹴り起こしてやる。いいわね！」
Russian (RU): "Итак, на сегодня всё. С завтрашнего дня вы следуете расписанию смен. Мадам очень строга относительно времени. Если кто‐нибудь из вас проспит, ответственность будет лежать на мне. Проспите — я вас пну. Всё ясно?!"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Certo, terminamos por hoje. Começando amanhã, vocês seguirão com suas rotinas. A madame é bem rigorosa sobre a hora. Se alguém dormir além da conta, a responsabilidade cairá sobre mim. Se fizer isso, acordarei a pessoa no chute. Entendido?!"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「那麼，今天就到此結束。從明天起按排班表上班。太太是位在時間上管得很嚴的人。你們若是睡懶覺，我就會被追究責任。敢睡懶覺，就踢醒你。懂了吧？！」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「那么，今天就到此结束。从明天起按排班表上班。太太是位在时间上管得很严的人。你们若是睡懒觉，我就会被追究责任。敢睡懒觉，就踢醒你。懂了吧？！」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Ok, abbiamo finito per oggi. Iniziando da domani, seguirete il vostro orario di turni. Madame è molto severa riguardo alla puntualità. Se qualcuna di voi dorme fino a tardi, dovrò assumermene la responsabilità. Quindi se lo fate, vi butterò giù dal letto. Capito?!"

Steam (ST): Of course, this experienced servant was one of the older girls from the Fukuin House. She's been here for two years, apparently.
Umineko Project (UP): Of course, this experienced servant was one of the older girls from the Gospel House.{n}She's been here for two years, apparently.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Of course, this experienced servant was one of the older girls from the Fukuin House. She's been here for two years, apparently.
PC Japanese (JP): 先輩使用人ももちろん、福音の家出身の先輩だ。彼女は２年前にここへ来たらしい。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 先輩使用人ももちろん、福音の家出身の先輩だ。{n}彼女は２年前にここへ来たらしい。
Russian (RU): Разумеется, эта опытная слуга одна из старших девушек, пришедших из Дома Фукуин.{n}Судя по всему, она проработала здесь уже два года.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): É claro, esta serviçal experiente era uma das garotas mais velhas que veio da Casa Fukuin. Aparentemente ela está aqui há dois anos.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 前輩傭人當然也是來自福音之家的前輩。{n}她好像是在 2 年前來這的。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 前辈佣人当然也是来自福音之家的前辈。{n}她好像是在 2 年前来这的。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Ovviamente, questa domestica esperta era una delle ragazze più anziane dalla Fukuin House. È qui da due anni, a quanto pare.

Steam (ST): That's probably why all the other new servants, who are older than me, seem to know her well.
Umineko Project (UP): That's probably why all the other new servants, who are older than me, seem to know her well.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): That's probably why all the other new servants, who are older than me, seem to know her well.
PC Japanese (JP): だから、私以外の年上の新入りたちは、彼女と面識があるようだった。
Russian (RU): Наверное, поэтому все другие новые слуги старше меня хорошо её знали.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Provavelmente é por isso que todos os outros serviçais, que são mais velhos do que eu, parecem conhecer bem ela.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 所以，新人中除去我的那幫比我大的孩子們，似乎都跟她有面識。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 所以，新人中除去我的那帮比我大的孩子们，似乎都跟她有面识。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Ecco perché probabilmente le altre domestiche, che sono più anziane di me, sembrano conoscerla bene.

Steam (ST): "That Madam looks so strict." "Dang, I'm tired." "*giggle*giggle*."
Umineko Project (UP): They all chatted noisily, saying things like "Madam looks so strict" and "Dang, I'm tired."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): 'That Madam looks so strict.' 'Dang, I'm tired.' '*giggle*giggle*.'
PC Japanese (JP): 奥様厳しそうっすねー、マジ疲れましたー、きゃっきゃと騒いでいる。
Russian (RU): 'Эта мадам выглядит такой строгой', 'Блин, я устала', '*хи‐хи*хи‐хи*'.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Todos conversando ruidosamente, dizendo coisas como "a madame parece bem rigorosa" e "puxa, cansei."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 嘰嘰喳喳地吵吵著“太太好像很嚴呢——”“真的累死我了——”。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 叽叽喳喳地吵吵着“太太好像很严呢——”“真的累死我了——”。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ‘Quella Madame sembra così severa. ’ ‘Diamine, sono stanca. ’ *giggle*giggle*.

Steam (ST): "...By the way, who exactly is this kid? Why were you chosen to be a servant?"
Umineko Project (UP): "......By the way, just who is this? Who chose this kid to be a servant?"
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): 「……ところでこの子、何者？　どうして使用人に選ばれたわけ？」
Russian (RU): "......Кстати, а это ещё кто? Кто выбрал слугой этого ребёнка?"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "......A propósito quem é essa? Quem escolheu essa criança para ser serviçal?"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「……話說，這孩子，是誰？為什麼，這孩子會被選來當傭人？」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「……话说，这孩子，是谁？为什么，这孩子会被选来当佣人？」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "... Comunque, chi è questa giovane persona? Perché sta lavorando tra i domestici?"

Steam (ST): The older servant pointed at me and asked the room at large, a dubious look on her face.
Umineko Project (UP): The older servant pointed at me and asked the room at large, a dubious look on her face.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): 先輩が私を指差し、怪訝そうな目で周りに訪ねる。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 先輩が私を指差し、怪訝そうな目で周りに尋ねる。
Russian (RU): Старшая слуга указала на меня и с сомнительным выражением обратилась к комнате в целом.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): A serviçal mais velha apontou para mim e perguntou para todos, com um olhar de dúvida no rosto.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 前輩指著我，目光詫異地問她身邊的人。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 前辈指着我，目光诧异地问她身边的人。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): La domestica anziana mi indicò e chiese alla stanza in generale, con un'espressione dubbiosa sul volto.

Steam (ST): It's no surprise, really. Most of us become servants when we graduate middle school or high school.
Umineko Project (UP): It's no surprise, really. Most of us become servants when we graduate middle school or high school.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): It's no surprise, really. Most of us become servants when we graduate middle school or high school.
PC Japanese (JP): 確かに怪訝にも思うだろう。普通、使用人たちは中卒か高卒を機に、使用人になる。
Russian (RU): Конечно, неудивительно. Большинство из нас становятся слугами после выпуска из средней или старшей школы.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Bem, não é surpresa. A maioria de nós se torna serviçal quando se forma no ensino fundamental ou no médio.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 倒也的確是會感到詫異的吧？一般來說，傭人們都是趁初中畢業或高中畢業之時來當傭人的。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 倒也的确是会感到诧异的吧？一般来说，佣人们都是趁初中毕业或高中毕业之时来当佣人的。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Non è una sorpresa, veramente. La maggior parte di noi può lavorare come domestico, quando supera la scuola media o quella superiore.

Steam (ST): But I'm just starting elementary school.
Umineko Project (UP): But I'm just starting elementary school.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): But I'm just starting elementary school.
PC Japanese (JP): でも私は、これから小学校だった。
Russian (RU): А я только пошла в начальную.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Mas eu recém estou começando o primário.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 但是我才剛要上小學。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 但是我才刚要上小学。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Ma io sto solo iniziando la scuola elementare.

Steam (ST): The others will be working as servants every day of the week, according to their standard shift schedule.
Umineko Project (UP): The others will be working as servants every day, according to their shifts.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): The others will be working as servants every day, according to their shifts.
PC Japanese (JP): 他の使用人たちはこれから毎日、通常のシフトに従い、使用人をすることになる。
Russian (RU): Остальные будут работать слугами каждый день, согласно их сменам.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Todo mundo trabalha como serviçal diariamente, de acordo com as suas rotinas de trabalho.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 其他傭人們自此開始，每天都將照著常規排班表，做傭人應當做的事。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 其他佣人们自此开始，每天都将照着常规排班表，做佣人应当做的事。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Le altre lavoreranno come domestiche ogni giorno, secondo i loro turni.

Steam (ST): However, on weekdays, I was going to go to the elementary school on Niijima with Milady, only working on weekends and when I had free time.
Umineko Project (UP): However, I was going to go to the elementary school on Niijima with Milady, only working on the weekends and when I had free time.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): However, I was going to go to the elementary school on Niijima with Milady, only working on the weekends and when I had free time.
PC Japanese (JP): しかし私は、平日はお嬢様と一緒に新島の小学校に通い、空いた時間と、土日だけお勤めをするのだ。
Russian (RU): А я буду вместе с миледи ходить в начальную школу на Нииджиме, работая только по выходным и в свободное время.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Porém, eu vou para a escola fundamental em Niijima junto com a ojou‐sama, e só trabalho nos fins de semana e quando tenho tempo livre.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 然而，我卻是除節假日外，都和小姐一起去新島的小學上學，只在空閑時間與周末上班。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 然而，我却是除节假日外，都和小姐一起去新岛的小学上学，只在空闲时间与周末上班。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Tuttavia, io andrò alla scuola elementare a Niijima con Milady, lavorando solo nei fine settimana e quando avrò tempo libero.

Steam (ST): It was an exception among exceptions, something that had never happened before.
Umineko Project (UP): It was an exception among exceptions, something that had never happened before.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): It was an exception among exceptions, something that had never happened before.
PC Japanese (JP): それは、これまでに例のない、異例中の異例だった。
Russian (RU): Исключение среди исключений, то, чего раньше никогда не случалось.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Uma exceção entre as exceções, algo que nunca tinha acontecido antes.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 這是個，一直以來從未有過先例的，特例中的特例。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 这是个，一直以来从未有过先例的，特例中的特例。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Era un'eccezione tra le eccezioni, qualcosa che non era mai successo prima.

Steam (ST): ...It was clear at a glance that the others, who had obtained their positions after a rigorous selection process, didn't like the fact that I was here too.
Umineko Project (UP): ......It was clear at a glance that the others, who had obtained their positions after a rigorous selection process, didn't like the fact that I was here too.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): ……厳しい選抜を潜り抜けて推薦を得た彼らにとって、私が納得行かない存在であるのは、一目瞭然だった。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): ……厳しい選抜を潜り抜けて推薦を得た彼らにとって、私が納得いかない存在であるのは、一目瞭然だった。
Russian (RU): ......С первого взгляда было видно, что остальным, получившим свои позиции после строгого отбора, не нравилось моё присутствие.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......Ficava claro ao olhar para os demais, que obtiveram suas posições após um rigoroso processo de seleção, que ninguém gostava do fato de eu estar aqui.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……對闖過嚴格選拔才獲得推薦的那些人來說，一目了然，我是個無法被認同的存在。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ……对闯过严格选拔才获得推荐的那些人来说，一目了然，我是个无法被认同的存在。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Bastava uno sguardo per capire che alle altre, che avevano ottenuto la loro posizione dopo un rigoroso processo di selezioni, non piaceva il fatto che anch'io fossi qui.

Steam (ST): "...Both Madam and Genji-sama have told me that you are to put your studies first. But you're still getting paid. Doesn't make any sense."
Umineko Project (UP): "......Both Madam and Genji‐sama have told me that you are to put your studies first. But you're still getting paid. Doesn't make any sense."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "......Both Madam and Genji-sama have told me that you are to put your studies first. But you're still getting paid. Doesn't make any sense."
PC Japanese (JP): 「……あんたについては、学業最優先でと奥様からも源次さまからも言われてるわ。でもお給金は出るんですってよ。意味わかんない。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「……あんたについては、学業最優先でと奥様からも源次さまからも言われてるわ。でもお給金は出るんですってよ。意味わかんない」
Russian (RU): "......И мадам, и господин Генджи сказали мне, что на первом месте у тебя должна быть учёба. И всё же тебе платят. В голове не укладывается."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "......Tanto a madame quanto o Genji‐sama já me disseram que você deve colocar seus estudos em primeiro lugar. Mas está recebendo um salário igual. Isso não faz sentido nenhum."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「……關於你，太太與源次先生都有關照過“學業第一”。但是，薪水卻照發。搞不懂什麼意思。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「……关于你，太太与源次先生都有关照过“学业第一”。但是，薪水却照发。搞不懂什么意思。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "... Sia Madame che Genji-sama mi hanno detto che devi mettere i tuoi studi per primi. Ma ricevi comunque una paga. Non ha alcun senso."

Steam (ST): If you're going to talk behind someone's back, at least do it behind them. She didn't even try to hide her discontent.
Umineko Project (UP): If you're going to talk behind someone's back, at least do it behind them. ......She didn't even try to hide her discontent.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): If you're going to talk behind someone's back, at least do it behind them. She didn't even try to hide her discontent.
PC Japanese (JP): 陰口なら、陰で言ってくれればいいのに。……先輩ははばかることなく、堂々と言う。
Russian (RU): Если сплетничаешь, хотя бы сплетничай не при мне. Она даже не скрыла недовольство.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Se vai falar pelas costas de alguém, ao menos faça isso pelas costas. ......Ela sequer tenta esconder sua indignação.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 既然是背地裏講的那種壞話，那就在背地裏講多好。……前輩毫無顧忌，光明正大地把這話說出了口。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 既然是背地里讲的那种坏话，那就在背地里讲多好。……前辈毫无顾忌，光明正大地把这话说出了口。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Se devi parlare male di qualcuno, almeno fallo alle sue spalle. Non provò neanche a nascondere il suo malcontento.

Steam (ST): "Is this kid really that smart? A child prodigy, or something?"
Umineko Project (UP): "Is this kid really that smart? A child prodigy, or something?"
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): 「こいつ、そんなに勉強できるの？　天才児？」
Russian (RU): "Она и вправду такая умная? Вундеркинд?"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Essa criança é mesmo inteligente? É uma criança prodígio ou algo do tipo?"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「這傢伙，是有那麼擅長學習嗎？天才兒童？」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「这家伙，是有那么擅长学习吗？天才儿童？」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "È così intelligente? Un infante prodigio, o qualcosa del genere?"

Steam (ST): "I never heard anything about that."
Umineko Project (UP): "Beats the heck out of me."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "Not that I've seen."
PC Japanese (JP): 「全然知んないです。」
Russian (RU): "Вовсе нет."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Faço a menor ideia."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「完全不清楚哦。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): [=CHT]
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Non che io sappia."

Steam (ST): "Well, that kid supposedly gets sick easily and is kept isolated most of the time. A total outsider to the rest of us, even back at the House."
Umineko Project (UP): "I didn't know this kid at all back in the House. They kept this one separate, apparently, something to do with a weak constitution."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "That one's always been kinda frail and a loner. I didn't know that kid well back in the House."
PC Japanese (JP): 「なんか病弱とかって、隔離されてたらしくて、家でも全然知りませんでしたし。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「なんか病弱とかって、隔離されてたらしくて、家でも全然知りませんでしたし」
Russian (RU): "Она всегда была из слабых и одиноких, я даже не знала её в Доме."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Não lembro dessa criança na Casa. Parece que eles a mantinham separada por ter uma condição mais debilitada ou algo do tipo."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「好像因為體弱多病一直被隔離著，在福音之家時也完全不清楚這傢伙的情況。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「好像因为体弱多病一直被隔离着，在福音之家时也完全不清楚这家伙的情况。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "È da sempre abbastanza fragile e si mantiene in disparte. Non lo conoscevo bene alla House."

Steam (ST): "...Now that you're here, you're part of the collective responsibility system. If you screw up, it's the same as everyone from the Fukuin House screwing up. Make sure you don't, okay?"
Umineko Project (UP): "......Now that you're here, you're part of the collective responsibility system. If you screw up, it's the same as everyone from the Gospel House screwing up. Make sure you don't, okay?"
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "......Now that you're here, you're part of the collective responsibility system. If you screw up, it's the same as everyone from the Fukuin House screwing up. Make sure you don't, okay?"
PC Japanese (JP): 「……ここに来た以上、連帯責任なんだからね。あんたがドジれば、福音の家の全員のドジだと思われるのよ。せいぜい気合入れなさいよね。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「……ここに来た以上、連帯責任なんだからね。あんたがドジれば、福音の家の全員のドジだと思われるのよ。せいぜい気合入れなさいよね」
Russian (RU): "......Здесь ты часть системы коллективной ответственности. Если напортачишь ты, напортачим все мы. Смотри, чтобы этого не было."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "......Agora que está aqui, você é parte do sistema de responsabilidade coletiva.{n}Se fizer merda, é o mesmo que todos da Casa Fukuin fazerem merda. É bom tomar cuidado, ouviu?"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「……既然來了這，那就要擔起連帶責任。你出的紕漏，會被當成福音之家所有人的紕漏。給我盡可能地加把勁。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「……既然来了这，那就要担起连带责任。你出的纰漏，会被当成福音之家所有人的纰漏。给我尽可能地加把劲。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "... Ora che sei qui, sei parte di un sistema di responsabilità collettiva. {n}Se fai casini, è come se tutti noi della Fukuin House lo facessimo. Vedi di evitarlo, ok?"

Steam (ST): I nodded weakly. ...I'd never been threatened by someone this much older than me, and I was very frightened.
Umineko Project (UP): I nodded weakly. ......I'd never been threatened by someone this much older than me, and I was very frightened.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): 私は弱々しく頷く。……こんなにも年上の人に凄まれることなんて、経験がなかったので、とても怖かった。
Russian (RU): Я слабо кивнула. ......Мне никогда не угрожали те, кто гораздо старше меня, и я была очень напугана.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Eu assenti de leve. ......Eu fiquei com medo porque ninguém mais velho nunca tinha me tratado assim antes.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 我怯懦地點了點頭。……由於從未被比我年長的人像這樣地凶過，所以心裡非常害怕。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 我怯懦地点了点头。……由于从未被比我年长的人像这样地凶过，所以心里非常害怕。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Annuii debolmente. ... Non ho mai ricevuto minacce da qualcuno così più grande di me, e avevo molta paura.

Speaker: Shannon
Steam (ST): "Don't worry. I'll be there with you. Let's give it our all together, okay?"
Umineko Project (UP): "Don't worry. I'll help you through. Let's give it our all together, okay?"
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): 「大丈夫よ。私も一緒だから。二人でがんばろ。ね。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「大丈夫よ。私も一緒だから。二人でがんばろ。ね」
Russian (RU): "Не беспокойся. Я с тобой. Давай будем стараться вместе, хорошо?"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Não se preocupe. Eu ajudarei você. Vamos dar o nosso melhor em conjunto, tá?"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「沒事的。我也跟你一起哦。兩個人一起加油吧。好嗎？」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「没事的。我也跟你一起哦。两个人一起加油吧。好吗？」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Non preoccuparti. Ti aiuterò. Mettiamocela tutta insieme, va bene?"

Steam (ST): Shannon smiled at me as she spoke...
Umineko Project (UP): Shannon smiled at me as she spoke...
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): 紗音はそう言って、そっと微笑んでくれた…。
Russian (RU): Сказав, Шаннон улыбнулась мне...
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): A Shannon sorriu para mim enquanto falava...
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 紗音這般說道，悄悄地對我微笑…。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 纱音这般说道，悄悄地对我微笑…。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Shannon mi sorrise mentre parlava...

Speaker: Zepar
Steam (ST): "Isn't Shannon scared too? This house looks pretty strict...!"
Umineko Project (UP): "Don't you find it scary, Shannon? This house looks pretty strict...!"
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "Wasn't Shannon scared too? This house looks pretty strict...!"
PC Japanese (JP): 「紗音は怖くないのかい？　この家は何だか厳しそう…！」
Russian (RU): "Разве Шаннон не испугалась? Этот дом выглядит таким строгим!.."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Você não tem medo, Shannon? Esta casa parece bem rigorosa...!"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「紗音她心裡不怕嗎？這戶人家，好像管得很嚴呢…！」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「纱音她心里不怕吗？这户人家，好像管得很严呢…！」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Non era spaventata anche Shannon? Questa casa sembra alquanto severa...!"

Speaker: Furfur
Steam (ST): "Nah, there's nothing scary about it. You just thought it was scary, so it got scary."
Umineko Project (UP): "No, there's nothing scary about it. It's only scary to you because that's what you think."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "Nah, there's nothing scary about it. You just thought it was scary, so you got scared."
PC Japanese (JP): 「うぅん、全然怖くなんかないよ。あなたが怖いと思うから、怖くなってしまうだけ。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「うぅん、全然怖くなんかないよ。あなたが怖いと思うから、怖くなってしまうだけ」
Russian (RU): "В нём нет ничего страшного. Тебе он просто показался страшным, оттого и испуг."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Não, não há nada para se ter medo. Você só está com medo porque acha que é assustador."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「不會呀，完全沒什麼好怕的喲。僅僅是你覺得可怕，所以才感到了可怕。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「不会呀，完全没什么好怕的哟。仅仅是你觉得可怕，所以才感到了可怕。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Nah, non c'è nulla di cui aver paura. Hai solo pensato che fosse spaventoso, quindi hai avuto paura."

Speaker: Zepar
Steam (ST): "Then if I thought it was fun, would it get fun?!"
Umineko Project (UP): "Then if I think it's fun, will it be fun?!"
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "Then if I thought it was fun, would it be fun?!"
PC Japanese (JP): 「じゃあ、楽しいと思ったら、楽しくなるのかな？！」
Russian (RU): "А если он покажется мне забавным, так и будет?!"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Então, se eu achar que é divertido, vai ser divertido?!"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「那麼，若是覺得開心，是不是就會變開心呢？！」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「那么，若是觉得开心，是不是就会变开心呢？！」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Quindi se pensassi che sia divertente, lo sarebbe?!"

Speaker: Furfur
Steam (ST): "Yeah, it would. So here too, let's give it our all with a smile."
Umineko Project (UP): "Yes, it will. So just like before, let's put on a smile and give it our all."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "Yeah, it would be. So let's put on a smile and give it our all."
PC Japanese (JP): 「うん、楽しくなるよ。だからここでも、笑顔でがんばろう。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「うん、楽しくなるよ。だからここでも、笑顔でがんばろう」
Russian (RU): "Да, будет. Так что давай и здесь с улыбкой выкладываться на полную."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Sim, vai sim. Por isso, assim como antes, coloque um sorriso no rosto e dê tudo de si."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「嗯，會變開心的喲。所以，在這也擺出笑容地努力吧。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「嗯，会变开心的哟。所以，在这也摆出笑容地努力吧。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Sì, lo sarebbe. Quindi facciamo un sorriso e mettiamocela tutta."

Speaker: Clair
Steam (ST): "...Shannon was my only friend in the Fukuin House. She was confident and popular. The complete opposite of me. I was embarrassingly dull-witted, and no one wanted to be my friend."
Umineko Project (UP): "......Shannon was my only friend in the Gospel House. She was confident and popular. The complete opposite of me. I was embarrassingly dull‐witted, and no one wanted to be my friend."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "......Shannon was my only friend in the Fukuin House. She was confident and popular. The complete opposite of me. I was embarrassingly dull-witted, and no one wanted to be my friend."
PC Japanese (JP): 「……紗音は、福音の家からの唯一の友人だった。彼女はしっかり者で人気者。我とは大違い。我は呆れるくらいにのろまで要領が悪くて、誰も友人になどなってはくれなかった。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「……紗音は、福音の家からの唯一の友人だった。彼女はしっかり者で人気者。我とは大違い。我は呆れるくらいにのろまで要領が悪くて、誰も友人になどなってはくれなかった」
Russian (RU): "......В Доме Фукуин Шаннон стала моей единственной подругой. Она была уверенной и популярной, моей полной противоположностью. Я же была ошеломляюще несмышлёной, и со мной никто не хотел заводить дружбу."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "......Dentre todos da Casa Fukuin, a Shannon era a minha única amiga. Ela era muito confiante e popular. Completamente diferente de mim. Sempre tive uma vergonha estúpida, e ninguém nunca quis fazer amizade comigo."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「……紗音是來自福音之家的，我唯一的友人。她能幹可靠，很受歡迎。與我大不相同。我很遲鈍，做事笨拙到了令人愕然的地步，誰都不肯當我的朋友。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「……纱音是来自福音之家的，我唯一的友人。她能干可靠，很受欢迎。与我大不相同。我很迟钝，做事笨拙到了令人愕然的地步，谁都不肯当我的朋友。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "... Shannon era la mia unica amica alla Fukuin House. Lei era sicura di sé e popolare. Il completo opposto di me. Ero ignorante in quantità imbarazzanti, e nessuno voleva stringere amicizia con me."

Speaker: Clair
Steam (ST): "I would never have made it through those days in the Fukuin House had it not been for her encouragement. ...So, I would probably make it through here too, with her by my side."
Umineko Project (UP): "I would never have made it through those days in the Gospel House had it not been for her encouragement. ......So, I would probably make it through here too, with her by my side."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "I would never have made it through those days in the Fukuin House had it not been for her encouragement. ......So, I would probably make it through here too, with her by my side."
PC Japanese (JP): 「そんな我が、福音の家でがんばってこれたのは、彼女がいつも励ましてくれたからだ。……なら、ここでも彼女と一緒に頑張れるだろう。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「そんな我が、福音の家でがんばってこれたのは、彼女がいつも励ましてくれたからだ。……なら、ここでも彼女と一緒に頑張れるだろう」
Russian (RU): "Я справлялась в Доме Фукуин только благодаря её поддержке. ......Возможно, с ней у меня и здесь всё получится."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Eu nunca teria passado pelos meus dias na Casa Fukuin se não fossem pelos encorajamentos dela. ......Por isso, eu faria o mesmo aqui também, com ela ao meu lado."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「像這樣的我，能在福音之家努力堅持下來，全得歸功於她一直的鼓勵。……那麼在這裡，我也能和她一起努力撐下去吧。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「像这样的我，能在福音之家努力坚持下来，全得归功于她一直的鼓励。……那么在这里，我也能和她一起努力撑下去吧。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Non ce l'avrei mai fatta attraverso quei giorni alla Fukuin House se non fosse stato per il suo incoraggiamento. ... Quindi, probabilmente ce la farò anche qui, con lei al mio fianco."

Speaker: Zepar
Steam (ST): "Well, isn't it about time we got ready for bed? I've got work early tomorrow morning, but you have a different job."
Umineko Project (UP): "Well, isn't it about time we got ready for bed? I've got work early tomorrow morning, but you have a different job."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): 「さぁ、早く寝支度をして休もう？　私は明日からすぐにお仕事だけれど、あなたは別のお仕事があるわ。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「さぁ、早く寝支度をして休もう？　私は明日からすぐにお仕事だけれど、あなたは別のお仕事があるわ」
Russian (RU): "Ну что, давай готовиться ко сну? Мне работать с раннего утра, а у тебя другая работа."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Bem, já não está na hora de irmos para cama? Eu tenho que trabalhar amanhã cedo, mas você tem um trabalho diferente."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「來，快點做好就寢的準備，休息吧。雖然我從明天起馬上就開始上班，但你有另一樁工作要幹。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「来，快点做好就寝的准备，休息吧。虽然我从明天起马上就开始上班，但你有另一桩工作要干。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Beh, non è il momento di prepararsi per andare a dormire? Ho del duro lavoro domani mattina presto, ma tu hai un compito diverso."

Speaker: Furfur
Steam (ST): "That's right. Unlike everyone else, I have to go to school. When I spend the night on Rokkenjima, I have to get ready for school and wait for Milady at the dock."
Umineko Project (UP): "That's right. Unlike everyone else, I have to go to school. When I spend the night on Rokkenjima, I have to get ready for school and wait for Milady at the dock."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): 「そう、私はみんなと違って、学校に通わなければならない。六軒島で泊まる時は、学校の支度をして、船着場でお嬢様をお迎えしなくちゃいけない。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「そう、私はみんなと違って、学校に通わなければならない。六軒島で泊まる時は、学校の支度をして、船着場でお嬢様をお迎えしなくちゃいけない」
Russian (RU): "Да. В отличие от всех остальных, мне нужно ходить в школу. Проведя ночь на Роккенджиме, я собираюсь в школу и жду миледи у причала."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Isso mesmo. Diferente do resto, eu tenho que ir à escola. Quando passo a noite em Rokkenjima, preciso me arrumar para a escola e esperar a ojou‐sama no atracadouro."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「是的，我與大家不同，必須去學校上學。在留宿於六軒島時，必須做好去學校的準備，在碼頭接小姐。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「是的，我与大家不同，必须去学校上学。在留宿于六轩岛时，必须做好去学校的准备，在码头接小姐。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "È così. A differenza di tutti gli altri, io devo andare a scuola. Quando passo la notte su Rokkenjima, devo prepararmi per la scuola e aspettare Milady alla banchina."

Speaker: Zepar
Steam (ST): "Milady looks like an energetic person. I hope you get along well!"
Umineko Project (UP): "Milady looks like an energetic person. I hope you get along well!"
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): 「お嬢様、元気そうな人だったね。仲良くなれるといいね！」
Russian (RU): "Миледи с виду такая энергичная. Надеюсь, вы поладите!"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "A ojou‐sama parece uma pessoa bem energética. Espero que vocês se deem bem!"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「小姐好像是位挺活潑的人呢。但願，能和她成為好朋友！」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「小姐好像是位挺活泼的人呢。但愿，能和她成为好朋友！」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Milady sembra una persona energica. Spero che andiate d'accordo!"

Speaker: Furfur
Steam (ST): "D-Do you think I will...? I'm so scared of school, so nervous...!"
Umineko Project (UP): "D‐do you think I will...? I'm scared of school, nervous...!"
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "D, do you think I will...? I'm scared of school, nervous...!"
PC Japanese (JP): 「な、仲良くなれるかな…。私、学校は怖いよ、緊張するよ…！」
Russian (RU): "С‐считаешь?.. Школа меня пугает, нервирует!.."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "A‐Acha que vou conseguir...? Estou com medo da escola, é muito nervosismo...!"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「不、不知道能否和她成為好朋友呢…？我，好怕學校，好緊張…！」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「不、不知道能否和她成为好朋友呢…？我，好怕学校，好紧张…！」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "P-Pensi che lo farò...? Ho paura della scuola, mi mette ansia...!"

Speaker: Clair
Steam (ST): "...I had grown used to life in the Fukuin House, so the more relaxed rules at school made life easy. But until I grew used to it, everything was new, and everything made me nervous."
Umineko Project (UP): "......I had grown used to life in the Gospel House, so the more relaxed rules at school made life easy. But until I grew used to it, everything was new, and everything made me nervous."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "......I had grown used to life in the Fukuin House, so the more relaxed rules at school made life easy. But until I grew used to it, everything was new, and everything made me nervous."
PC Japanese (JP): 「……福音の家での生活に慣れていた我にとっては、規則緩き学校など気楽なもの。しかし、慣れるまでは、全てが新しく、そして不安なのだった。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「……福音の家での生活に慣れていた我にとっては、規則緩き学校など気楽なもの。しかし、慣れるまでは、全てが新しく、そして不安なのだった」
Russian (RU): "......После жизни в Доме Фукуин с более мягкими школьными правилами жить стало проще. Но до тех пор, пока я к ним не привыкла, всё было ново и всё нервировало."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "......Eu cresci me acostumando com a vida na Casa Fukuin, por isso as regras mais frouxas da escola tornavam a minha vida mais fácil. Mas até me acostumar com isso, tudo era novo, e tudo gerava nervosismo."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「……對習慣了福音之家的生活的我來說，規矩松的學校輕鬆得很。但是，在直到習慣前，一切都很新鮮，一切都很不安。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「……对习惯了福音之家的生活的我来说，规矩松的学校轻松得很。但是，在直到习惯前，一切都很新鲜，一切都很不安。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "... Ho fatto l'abitudine alla vita alla Fukuin House, quindi le regole più tranquille a scuola mi davano vita facile. Ma finché non mi ci abituavo, era tutto nuovo, e tutto mi metteva ansia."

Steam (ST): My new life on Rokkenjima probably deserves an explanation.
Umineko Project (UP): My new life on Rokkenjima probably deserves an explanation.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): 六軒島の新しい生活について、説明が要るだろう。
Russian (RU): Моя новая жизнь на Роккенджиме заслуживает объяснения.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): A minha nova vida em Rokkenjima provavelmente merece uma explicação.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 關於六軒島的新生活，多半得進行下說明吧？
Chinese Simplified (CN): 关于六轩岛的新生活，多半得进行下说明吧？
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): La mia nuova vita su Rokkenjima probabilmente necessita di una spiegazione.

Steam (ST): It was completely different from the comfortable yet stagnant life I'd lived at the Fukuin House.
Umineko Project (UP): It was completely different from the comfortable yet stagnant life I'd lived at the Gospel House.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): It was completely different from the comfortable yet stagnant life I'd lived at the Fukuin House.
PC Japanese (JP): ここでの日々は、福音の家での、温かいながらも澱んで滞った日々とはまったく違う。
Russian (RU): Она совершенно отличалась от комфортной, но всё же вялой жизни в Доме Фукуин.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Era completamente diferente da vida confortável e estagnada que eu vivia na Casa Fukuin.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 在這的日子，與在福音之家的溫暖且淤塞停滯的日子完全不同。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 在这的日子，与在福音之家的温暖且淤塞停滞的日子完全不同。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Era completamente diversa dalla comoda ma stagnante vita vissuta alla Fukuin House.

Steam (ST): In addition to the time I spent as a servant to the Ushiromiya family on Rokkenjima, I also traveled to the elementary school on Niijima on school days.
Umineko Project (UP): In addition to the time I spent as a servant to the Ushiromiya family on Rokkenjima, I also traveled to the elementary school on Niijima on school days.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): In addition to the time I spent as a servant to the Ushiromiya family on Rokkenjima, I also traveled to the elementary school on Niijima on school days.
PC Japanese (JP): 私には六軒島の右代宮家に仕える使用人としての日々と、新島の小学校に通う日々が同時に与えられた。
Russian (RU): Помимо работы слугой семьи Уширомия на Роккенджиме, по будням я ездила в начальную школу на Нииджиме.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Além do tempo que eu passava servindo à família Ushiromiya em Rokkenjima, eu também viajava para a escola primária em Niijima durante os dias de semana.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 我同時得到了，作為傭人侍奉六軒島的右代宮家的生活，與去新島的小學上學的生活。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 我同时得到了，作为佣人侍奉六轩岛的右代宫家的生活，与去新岛的小学上学的生活。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): In aggiunta al tempo che passavo al servizio della famiglia Ushiromiya su Rokkenjima, viaggiai anche alla scuola elementare a Niijima nei giorni scolastici.

Steam (ST): It was the start of a time that was both rushed and busy, with hardly a moment to relax.
Umineko Project (UP): It was the start of a time that was both rushed and busy, with hardly any time to relax.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): It was the start of a time that was both rushed and busy, with hardly any time to relax.
PC Japanese (JP): 慌しくて忙しくて、気の緩む間もない新しき日々の幕開けである。
Russian (RU): Начался стремительный и занятый период без всякой возможности расслабиться.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Foi o começo de um tempo de muita agitação e ocupação, praticamente sem horas vagas para descansar.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 慌亂匆忙，連鬆口氣的時間都沒有的新生活，拉開了帷幕。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 慌乱匆忙，连松口气的时间都没有的新生活，拉开了帷幕。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Era l'inizio di un periodo sia frettoloso che pieno, con difficilmente del tempo per rilassarsi.

Steam (ST): Unlike the time I spent at the Fukuin House, I didn't get to sleep in the same bed every day.
Umineko Project (UP): Unlike at the Gospel House, I didn't get to sleep in the same bed every day here.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Unlike at the Fukuin House, I didn't get to sleep in the same bed every day here.
PC Japanese (JP): 福音の家と違い、ここでは毎日を同じベッドでは寝られない。
Russian (RU): В отличие от Дома Фукуин, у меня не было своей кровати.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Diferente da Casa Fukuin, eu não dormia na mesma cama todos os dias aqui.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 與福音之家不同，在這沒法每天都睡同一張床。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 与福音之家不同，在这没法每天都睡同一张床。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): A differenza della Fukuin House, qui non dormivo ogni giorno nello stesso letto.

Steam (ST): Half of the week, I slept in the servant waiting room in the Rokkenjima mansion.
Umineko Project (UP): Half of the week, I slept in the servants' quarters in the Rokkenjima mansion.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Half of the week, I slept in the servant waiting room in the Rokkenjima mansion.
PC Japanese (JP): 週の半分は六軒島のお屋敷の、使用人控え室のベッドで休む。
Russian (RU): Половину недели я спала в приёмной слуг в особняке Роккенджимы.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Metade da semana eu dormia nas acomodações dos serviçais, que ficavam na mansão de Rokkenjima.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 一周中的一半時間，是在六軒島大屋的傭人等候室的床上休息的。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 一周中的一半时间，是在六轩岛大屋的佣人等候室的床上休息的。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Per metà settimana, dormivo nella stanza dei domestici nella villa di Rokkenjima.

Steam (ST): I would return from school with Milady, go to the mansion, and work there as a servant. I would then stay the night and go to school with Milady again the next day.
Umineko Project (UP): I would return from school with Milady, go to the mansion, and work there as a servant. I would then stay the night and head to school with Milady again the next morning.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): I would return from school with Milady, go to the mansion, and work there as a servant. I would then stay the night and go to school with Milady again the next day.
PC Japanese (JP): 放課後にお嬢様と一緒に下校してお屋敷へ行き、そこで使用人としてのお勤めをして、そのまま泊まって翌朝、またお嬢様と一緒に登校するのだ。
Russian (RU): После школы я возвращаюсь с миледи в особняк и работаю там слугой. Потом остаюсь на ночь и на следующий день снова еду с миледи в школу.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Eu voltava da escola com a ojou‐sama, ia para a mansão e trabalhava como serviçal. Então passava a noite e ia para a escola junto com a ojou‐sama na manhã seguinte.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 放學後就與小姐一起去大屋，在大屋作為傭人上班，接著就此留宿到次日清晨，然後繼續與小姐一起去學校。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 放学后就与小姐一起去大屋，在大屋作为佣人上班，接着就此留宿到次日清晨，然后继续与小姐一起去学校。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Ritornerei da scuola con Milady, andrei alla villa, e lavorerei lì insieme ai domestici. Quindi starei per la notte e andrei di nuovo a scuola con Milady il giorno dopo.

Steam (ST): When I didn't have work, I would return to the dormitory on Niijima, where I could have some time to myself in the room that I was assigned to.
Umineko Project (UP): On days when I didn't have work, I would return to the dormitory on Niijima, where I could have some time to myself in the room that had been assigned to me.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): When I didn't have work, I would return to the dormitory on Niijima, where I could have some time to myself in the room that I was assigned to.
PC Japanese (JP): お勤めのない日は新島の寮に帰り、自分に与えられた部屋で自由に過ごすことが出来る。
Russian (RU): Когда работы нет, я возвращаюсь в общежитие на Нииджиме, где могу побыть в отведённой мне комнате.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Nos dias em que eu não precisava trabalhar, eu voltava para o dormitório em Niijima, onde podia ter um tempo para mim no quarto que me foi conferido.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 在不用上班的日子，我是回新島的宿舍，可以在給予我的房間裡自由地消磨時間。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 在不用上班的日子，我是回新岛的宿舍，可以在给予我的房间里自由地消磨时间。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Quando non dovevo lavorare, avrei fatto ritorno ai dormitori a Niijima, dove potevo avere del tempo per me nella stanza assegnatami.

Steam (ST): There was an adult dorm mother who strictly controlled mealtimes and lights-out, but I was already used to that sort of life, so it wasn't hard for me.
Umineko Project (UP): There was an adult dorm mother who strictly controlled mealtimes and lights‐out, but I was already used to that sort of life from the Gospel House, so it wasn't hard for me.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): There was an adult dorm mother who strictly controlled mealtimes and lights-out, but I was already used to that sort of life, so it wasn't hard for me.
PC Japanese (JP): 一応、大人の寮母がいて食事や消灯の時間を厳しく管理していたが、福音の家でそういう生活には慣れているので、苦にはならなかった。
Russian (RU): Хозяйка общежития строго контролировала время приёма пищи и отбоя, но я уже привыкла к такой жизни, и она не была для меня трудной.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Tinha uma mãe adulta no dormitório que controlava rigorosamente as refeições e o apagar das luzes, mas como já tinha me acostumado com esse tipo de vida na Casa Fukuin, não foi difícil para mim.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 雖然姑且也算是有成年女舍監，在嚴格管理著吃飯與熄燈的時間，不過由於我在福音之家已經習慣了這種生活，所以並不難熬。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 虽然姑且也算是有成年女舍监，在严格管理着吃饭与熄灯的时间，不过由于我在福音之家已经习惯了这种生活，所以并不难熬。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): C'era una donna che gestiva il dormitorio e che controllava severamente gli orari dei pasti e il coprifuoco, ma avevo già fatto l'abitudine a quel tipo di vita, quindi non era difficile per me.

Steam (ST): The rooms were slightly larger than average and housed three people each.
Umineko Project (UP): The rooms were slightly larger than average and housed three people each.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): The rooms were slightly larger than average and housed three people each.
PC Japanese (JP): 部屋は、少し大きめのものでそれぞれが３人部屋になっていた。
Russian (RU): Комнаты были чуть больше средних, и в каждую такую размещали по три человека.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Os quartos eram levemente maiores que a média e acomodavam três pessoas em cada.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 房間稍有點大，各個房間均被分配成了 3 人一間。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 房间稍有点大，各个房间均被分配成了 3 人一间。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Le stanze erano leggermente più spaziose della media e ospitavano tre persone l'una.

Steam (ST): However, either because of the number of people or some lucky chance, I was not given a three-person room.
Umineko Project (UP): However, either because of the number of people or some lucky chance, I was not given a three‐person room.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): However, either because of the number of people or some lucky chance, I was not given a three-person room.
PC Japanese (JP): しかし、人数の関係か幸運なのか、我は３人部屋にはならなかった。
Russian (RU): Тем не менее, либо из‐за числа людей, либо по счастливой случайности, мне не дали трёхместную комнату.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Porém, seja pelo número de pessoas ou algum golpe de sorte, eu não fiquei em um quarto para três.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 不過，是因為人數的關係，還是因為走運呢，我並沒有被分配到 3 人房。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 不过，是因为人数的关系，还是因为走运呢，我并没有被分配到 3 人房。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Tuttavia, o per il numero di persone o per un colpo di fortuna, non mi è stata data una stanza per tre persone.

Umineko Project (UP): "Looks like we'll share a room back here in the dorms too."

Speaker: Ushiromiya Natsuhi
Steam (ST): "Correct. Every year, new servants came from the Fukuin House, replacing some of the old ones."
Umineko Project (UP): "Correct. Every year, new servants came from the Gospel House, replacing some of the old ones."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "Correct. Every year, new servants came from the Fukuin House, replacing some of the old ones."

PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「えぇ。福音の家から毎年、何人かの使用人が入れ替わりでやって来ていました」

Nessuna conoscenza di lavori domestici, nessuna esperienza pratica, e non ha neanche finito con l'educazione richiesta. Non so a cosa stesse pensando Nostro Padre, ma ho sempre pensato che ci fosse qualcosa di chiaramente strano riguardo a ciò."

Russian (RU): Строго говоря, Джессика не была преемницей, но, поскольку она могла выбрать преемника руководства, это ничего не меняет.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Estritamente falando, Jessica não era a sucessora do chefe, mas como ela poderia ser selecionada para ser, acabaria dando tudo na mesma.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 雖然嚴謹地講並非如此，但朱志香擁有選擇未來的下任當主的權利，所以意義相同。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 虽然严谨地讲并非如此，但朱志香拥有选择未来的下任当主的权利，所以意义相同。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): A rigor di termini, Jessica non era il successore, ma dato che avrebbe potuto scegliere il successore del capofamiglia, si arrivava alla stessa conclusione.

Speaker: Clair
Steam (ST): "The more one learns, the less simple this tale becomes. There were some who celebrated my birth, and some who did not. ...Genji could only wait in silence for the proper day to reveal it all."
Umineko Project (UP): "It is a tale that becomes less simple the more one learns of it. Some would celebrate my birth; others would not. ......Genji could only wait in silence for the day of revelation to come."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "The more one learns, the less simple this tale becomes. There were some who celebrated my birth, and some who did not. ......Genji could only wait in silence for the day of revelation to come."
PC Japanese (JP): 「それは知れば知るほどに容易ならざる物語。我の生まれを、祝福する者もいれば、祝福せざる者もいる。……源次はそれを明かす日を静かに待つしかないのである。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「それは知れば知るほどに容易ならざる物語。我の生まれを、祝福する者もいれば、祝福せざる者もいる。……源次はそれを明かす日を静かに待つしかないのである」
Russian (RU): "Чем больше узнаёшь, тем менее простой становится эта история. Были и те, кто радовался моему рождению, и те, кто нет. ......Генджи оставалось лишь молча ждать наступления дня откровения."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "É um conto que vai deixando de ser simples conforme você vai aprendendo sobre ele. Alguns celebrariam meu nascimento; outros não. ......O Genji só podia esperar em silêncio pelo dia da revelação."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「這是個知道得越多就越不簡單的故事。我的出生，有人祝福，有人不祝福。……源次只能靜靜等待將此挑明的那一天。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「这是个知道得越多就越不简单的故事。我的出生，有人祝福，有人不祝福。……源次只能静静等待将此挑明的那一天。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Meno uno sa, meno semplice diventa questa storia. C'erano alcuni che festeggiavano la mia nascita, e chi no. ... Genji poteva solo attendere in silenzio che arrivasse il giorno della rivelazione."

Umineko Project (UP): "Was it a tale hidden only within Genji's heart?"

Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Era una storia nascosta solo nel cuore di Genji?"

Steam (ST): "Lion and Kinzo and Natsuhi and Krauss and Jessica and everyone else! None of them knew this tale!"
Umineko Project (UP): "Lion and Kinzo and Natsuhi and Krauss and Jessica and everyone else! None of them knew of this tale!"

Speaker: Clair
Steam (ST): "Thus, the curtains slowly rise on this curious tale in the year 1976. Oh, I am one yet many. Why must fate abandon us and continue on its merry way...?"
Umineko Project (UP): "Thus, the curtains slowly rise on this curious tale in the year 1976. Oh, I am one yet many. Why must fate proceed so selfishly and freely, leaving us behind......?"
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "Thus, the curtains slowly rise on this curious tale in the year 1976. Oh, I am one yet many. Why must fate abandon us and continue on its merry way......?"
PC Japanese (JP): 「かくして、この奇妙な物語は１９７６年より、ゆっくりと幕を開けるのである。あぁ、我こそは我にして我等なり。なぜに運命はかくにも、我等を捨て置いて自由気まま身勝手に進むのか……。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「かくして、この奇妙な物語は１９７６年より、ゆっくりと幕を開けるのである。あぁ、我こそは我にして我等なり。なぜに運命はかくにも、我等を捨て置いて自由気まま身勝手に進むのか……」
Russian (RU): "Эта загадочная история берёт начало в 1976 году. О, я одна, но всё же нас много. Почему судьба покинула нас и продолжила свой беззаботный путь?.."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Assim, as cortinas lentamente subiram neste conto do ano de 1976. Oh! Eu sou uma e também muitas. Por que o destino procede de forma tão egoísta e espontânea, deixando‐nos para trás......?"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「就像這樣，這個奇妙的故事從 1976 年起，慢慢地拉開了帷幕。啊——，我既是我，也是我們。為什麼命運會這般將我們拋下不管，隨心所欲地顧自前行呢……？」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「就像这样，这个奇妙的故事从 1976 年起，慢慢地拉开了帷幕。啊——，我既是我，也是我们。为什么命运会这般将我们抛下不管，随心所欲地顾自前行呢……？」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Così, il sipario si alza lentamente su questa strana storia nell'anno 1976. {n}Oh, io sono una eppure molti. Perché il fato deve abbandonarci e continuare per la sua allegra strada...?"

Umineko Project (UP): So why not indulge Kinzo's whim...?

Speaker: Clair
Steam (ST): "However, it was not so for the other Fukuin servants, who were always close by and who believed that everyone should be treated equally. Their small bits of discontent over my special treatment began to accumulate as time went on..."
Umineko Project (UP): "However, it was not so for the other servants of the Gospel House, who were always close by and who believed that everyone should be treated equally. As time went on, their little grievances about my special treatment began to accumulate......"
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "However, it was not so for the other Fukuin servants, who were always close by and who believed that everyone should be treated equally. Their small bits of discontent over my special treatment began to accumulate as time went on......"
PC Japanese (JP): 「しかし、いつも側にいて、同じ待遇であるべきと思っている福音の家の使用人たちは違う。彼らは、明らかに自分たちとは違う我の扱いに、日々の小さな不満を蓄積させていったのだった……。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「しかし、いつも側にいて、同じ待遇であるべきと思っている福音の家の使用人たちは違う。彼らは、明らかに自分たちとは違う我の扱いに、日々の小さな不満を蓄積させていったのだった……」
Russian (RU): "Но только не остальные слуги Фукуин, которые всегда были рядом и считали, что ко всем должны относиться одинаково. Их недовольство по поводу особого отношения ко мне со временем стало накапливаться..."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Entretanto, não era bem assim para os outros serviçais da Casa Fukuin, que eram sempre próximos e acreditavam que todos deveriam ser tratados igualmente. Com o passar do tempo, suas queixas sobre o tratamento especial que eu recebia começaram a se acumular......"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「不過，一直都在身邊，認為應當一視同仁的福音之家的傭人們可並非如此。他們對明顯跟自己不同的我的待遇，日復一日積蓄著小小的不滿……」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「不过，一直都在身边，认为应当一视同仁的福音之家的佣人们可并非如此。他们对明显跟自己不同的我的待遇，日复一日积蓄着小小的不满……」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Tuttavia, non era così per gli altri domestici della Fukuin, che erano sempre vicini e che credevano che tutti dovessero essere trattati ugualmente. Quel loro provare malcontento sul mio trattamento speciale iniziò ad accumularsi col tempo..."

Umineko Project (UP): "Good job, Sawachi. How'd it go today?"

Umineko Project (UP): Because of this, their original names are not spoken there, and everyone uses new "blessed names" instead.

PC Japanese (JP): その為、本来の名前はそこでは伏せ、新しく与えられた、“祝福された名前”で名乗ることになっているのです。

Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Por causa disso, seus nomes verdadeiros não são ditos e todos recebem novos "nomes abençoados".
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 因此在那裡，他們隱去本名，使用新給的“受祝福的名字”。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 因此在那里，他们隐去本名，使用新给的“受祝福的名字”。

Steam (ST): Maybe because the {p:0:音} character is in the word "Fukuin", that character is almost always combined with at least one character from the child's original name to make their new name.
Umineko Project (UP): Maybe because the "{ruby:in/on/non/ne:{p:0:音}}" character is in the word "Gospel" ({ruby:Fukuin:{p:0:福音}}), that character is almost always combined with at least one character from the child's original name to make their new name.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Maybe because the {p:0:音} character is in the word 'Fukuin', that character is almost always combined with at least one character from the child's original name to make their new name.
PC Japanese (JP): 福音の家だからそうなのか、大抵の場合、“音”の一字と、名前の一字を組み合わせて新しい名前を与えられるのがほとんど。
Russian (RU): Быть может, из‐за иероглифа '{p:0:音}' в слове 'Фукуин', для создания нового имени почти всегда берут его и, по крайней мере, один иероглиф из первоначального имени ребёнка.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Talvez porque o kanji "{ruby:in/on/non/ne:{p:0:音}}" também esteja presente na palavra ({ruby:Fukuin:{p:0:福音}}) — "Evangelho". Um caractere quase sempre combinado com o último caractere original do nome da criança para criar o seu novo nome.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 是因為是福音之家，所以才這麼定的麼？在絕大多數情況下，他們都會得到，取名字中的一個字，再加上“音”字所組成的新名字。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 是因为是福音之家，所以才这么定的么？在绝大多数情况下，他们都会得到，取名字中的一个字，再加上“音”字所组成的新名字。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Forse perché il carattere {p:0:音} è presente nella parola ‘Fukuin’, quel carattere è sempre combinato con almeno un carattere del nome originale del bambino per dare il loro nuovo nome.

Steam (ST): ...Still, just giving a person a new name doesn't mean they'll accept it so easily.
Umineko Project (UP): ......Still, just giving a person a new name doesn't mean they'll accept it so easily.

Steam (ST): Boys and girls, who have lived in isolation and through various trials, sometimes feel as though their real first and last names are a bond that's worth holding onto.
Umineko Project (UP): The boys and girls of the Gospel House, living without relatives due to all kinds of circumstances, often feel as though their real first and last names are a bond that's worth holding onto.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Boys and girls, who've lived in isolation and through various trials, sometimes feel as though their real first and last names are a bond that's worth holding onto.

Umineko Project (UP): So, many of the Gospel children hate their "{p:0:音}" names and call each other by nicknames based on their original names.

PC Japanese (JP): だから、“音”の名前を嫌い、自分たち本来の名前のあだ名で呼び合うことが多かったです。
Russian (RU): Поэтому большинство детей Фукуин ненавидят свои '{p:0:音}'‐имена и называют друг друга прозвищами, основанными на их первоначальных именах.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Por isso, muitas crianças da Casa Fukuin odiavam o "{p:0:音}" em seus nomes e se chamavam por apelidos baseados em seus verdadeiros nomes.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 所以，他們大多討厭帶“音”的名字，互相叫自己本名的暱稱。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 所以，他们大多讨厌带“音”的名字，互相叫自己本名的昵称。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Quindi, la maggior parte dei ragazzi della Fukuin odiano i loro nomi ‘{p:0:音}’, e si chiamano con soprannomi basati sui loro nomi originali.

Steam (ST): Of course, that's only done privately. When in the presence of the House Director or other important people, only the "blessed names" are used.
Umineko Project (UP): Of course, this is only privately. When in the presence of the House Director or other important people, only the blessed names are used.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Of course, this is only privately. When in the presence of the House Director or other important people, only the 'blessed names' are used.
PC Japanese (JP): もちろん、陰での話。院長先生などの前では、きちんと祝福された名前でやりとりをしてました。
Russian (RU): Разумеется, только наедине. В присутствии директора Дома и других важных людей употребляются только благословлённые имена.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): É claro, apenas quando estavam sozinhas. Quando o diretor da Casa ou alguém importante estava presente, apenas os nomes abençoados eram usados.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 當然，是在背地裏這麼叫。在院長老師等人的面前，他們都有好好地用受祝福的名字進行交談。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 当然，是在背地里这么叫。在院长老师等人的面前，他们都有好好地用受祝福的名字进行交谈。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Ovviamente, ciò vale solo in ambito privato. Quando in presenza del Direttore della Casa o altre persone importanti, sono usati solo i ‘nomi benedetti’.

Steam (ST): On the job, the "blessed names" are used. And off the job, informal nicknames are used.
Umineko Project (UP): On the job, the blessed names are used. And off the job, the informal nicknames are used.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): On the job, the 'blessed names' are used. And off the job, the informal nicknames are used.
PC Japanese (JP): 仕事中は祝福された名前で。そしてオフになったら、馴染みのあだ名で。
Russian (RU): На работе то же самое. А вне работы используются неофициальные прозвища.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): No trabalho, os nomes abençoados eram utilizados. Fora do trabalho, os apelidos informais eram utilizados.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 在工作時用受祝福的名字。然後，等到了休息時間，就用親昵的暱稱。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 在工作时用受祝福的名字。然后，等到了休息时间，就用亲昵的昵称。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): A lavoro, vengono usati i ‘nomi benedetti’. E al di fuori di esso, vengono usati i soprannomi informali.

Steam (ST): Everyone's very used to living with two names like this, so they're all comfortable with how the system works.
Umineko Project (UP): Everyone is very used to living with two names like this, so they're all naturals at switching between the two.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Everyone is very used to living with two names like this, so they're all familiar with how to use them.
PC Japanese (JP): そんな、２つの名前での生活が当り前だったので、皆、使い分けは自然に出来ていました。
Russian (RU): Все привыкли жить с двумя именами и знали, как их употреблять.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Todos estão bem acostumados a viver com dois nomes, por isso era natural alternar entre eles.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 由於在理所當然地過著，像這樣的有 2 個名字的生活，所以他們全都能很自然地在不同的場合用不同的叫法。

Steam (ST): "Don't you think Kumasawa-san's obviously soft on Yasu? It's like she's mistaken Yasu for her own grandchild or something!"

Russian (RU): "......Я знаю, что у тебя школа, но не забывай, что ты тоже слуга. Ты не можешь вечно помогать, так что учись делать работу самостоятельно, как все мы. Мы не собираемся вечно делать тебе поблажки."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ".........Eu sei que precisa se preocupar com a escola, mas não se esqueça do seu trabalho como serviçal, tá? Tem que parar de ser ajudante e aprender a trabalhar por conta, assim como todo mundo. Não vamos deixar que a sua vida seja uma moleza, ouviu?"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「………雖明白你要上學。但你姑且算是個傭人吧？別老是像個幫忙的似的，快給我變得能獨當一面，來跟我們幹同樣的活兒。我們可不會永永遠遠都只縱容你一個哦？」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「………虽明白你要上学。但你姑且算是个佣人吧？别老是像个帮忙的似的，快给我变得能独当一面，来跟我们干同样的活儿。我们可不会永永远远都只纵容你一个哦？」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "... Capisco che devi preoccuparti della scuola, ma non dimenticare che lavori anche fra i domestici, ok? Devi smettere di essere l'aiutante e imparare a fare il lavoro senza aiuto, come noialtri. Non ti lasceremo avere vita facile per sempre, va bene?"

Umineko Project (UP): I can't fold clothes right, and I'm not good at using a dustpan.

Umineko Project (UP): I just can't do it as well as everyone else......
Original Witch Hunt (OG): I just can't do it as well as everyone else......

Steam (ST): As my face turned red, ...I spotted Shannon, who was watching from the sidelines and not joining in.
Umineko Project (UP): As my face turned red, ......I spotted Shannon, who was watching from the sidelines and not joining in.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): As my face turned red, ......I spotted Shannon, who was watching from the sidelines and not joining in.
PC Japanese (JP): 私が俯いていると、……みんなには加わらずに、じっと見守ってくれている紗音の姿に気付きました。

Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Assim que o meu rosto ficou vermelho, ......eu vi a Shannon, que estava observando no canto e não se juntou.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 我剛低下頭去，……就發現了沒加入大家，一動不動地看著我的紗音的身影。

Steam (ST): ...Shannon is my only ally. Unlike me, she can do everything well.
Umineko Project (UP): ......Shannon is my only ally.{n}Unlike me, she can do everything well.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): ......Shannon is my only ally. Unlike me, she can do everything well.

PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): ……紗音だけは、私の味方です。{n}紗音は私と違い、本当によく仕事が出来ます。
Russian (RU): ......Шаннон — мой единственный союзник.{n}В отличие от меня, у неё всё хорошо получается.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......A Shannon é a minha única aliada.{n}Diferente de mim, ela consegue fazer tudo muito bem.

Umineko Project (UP): She'll show me how things are done, but she'll never steal my jobs from me.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): She'll show me how things are done, but she'll never steal my jobs from me.

Umineko Project (UP): She really is incredible.

Umineko Project (UP): I really want to be like Shannon, as soon as I can.

Umineko Project (UP): ......She never talks behind people's backs, and no one talks behind her back. She's kind, and she gets along with everyone.

Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......Ela nunca fala pelas costas de ninguém e ninguém fala dela pelas costas. Ela é gentil e se dá bem com todo mundo.

Original Witch Hunt (OG): I want to be like her. And she's always kindly watching over my efforts to become like her.

Umineko Project (UP): "......Why......did I end up here?"

Umineko Project (UP): Though I'd just been muttering to the ceiling, Shannon gave me an honest answer.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]

Speaker: Shannon

Umineko Project (UP): "I guess there's no way to say it except that it's part of God's plan."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "I guess there's no way to say it, except that it's part of God's plan."

Umineko Project (UP): "Is this another test from God...?"

Chinese Simplified (CN): 「你是说，这也是神的考验吗…？」

Speaker: Shannon
Steam (ST): "Yep. Think of it as a test to help you grow into a wonderful human being. After all, you're a special, chosen person."
Umineko Project (UP): "Yep. Think of it as a test to help you grow into a wonderful person. After all, you're a special, chosen person."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]

Russian (RU): "Да. Считай это испытанием, помогающим тебе вырасти замечательным человеком. Ведь ты особенный, избранный человек."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Sim. Pense nisso como sendo um teste que contribuirá para que se torne uma pessoa maravilhosa. Afinal, você é especial, uma pessoa escolhida."

Umineko Project (UP): "......Am I......special?"

Chinese Simplified (CN): 「……我是，……特别的吗？」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "... Io sono... speciale?"

Speaker: Shannon
Steam (ST): "Of course you are. After all, everyone else here is huge, but you were the only one special enough to be chosen young."
Umineko Project (UP): "Of course you are. After all, everyone else here is big, but you were the only one special enough to be chosen young."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "Of course you are. After all, everyone else here is huge, but you were the only one special enough to be chosen young."

Umineko Project (UP): "Why am I the only one who's little? I can't do any jobs by myself."

Umineko Project (UP): Everyone complains that I'm just there to play with Milady.

Steam (ST): "You may be ten years younger than everyone else, but that means, if you keep it up until you're the same age as the others, you'll be much more experienced than the new people who come later. Even Genji-sama will acknowledge your talents, and you'll become a leader who can teach the new kids who come from the Fukuin House."
Umineko Project (UP): "You may be ten years younger than everyone else, but that means, if you keep it up until you're the same age as the others, you'll be much more experienced than the new people who come later. Even Genji‐sama will acknowledge your talents, and you'll become a leader who can teach the new kids who come from the Gospel House."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "You may be ten years younger than everyone else, but that means, if you keep it up until you're the same age as the others, you'll be much more experienced than the new people who come later. Even Genji-sama will acknowledge your talents, and you'll become a leader who can teach the new kids who come from the Fukuin House."
PC Japanese (JP): 「あなたはみんなより１０も幼いけれど。ということは、みんなと同じ歳になるまでここで頑張ったなら、新しく来る人たちより、ずっと仕事の出来る人になっているということだよ。源次さまにも認められて、あなたは新しく福音の家から来る人たちに仕事を教えてあげる、リーダーの役になるの。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「あなたはみんなより１０も幼いけれど。ということは、みんなと同じ歳になるまでここで頑張ったなら、新しく来る人たちより、ずっと仕事の出来る人になっているということだよ。源次さまにも認められて、あなたは新しく福音の家から来る人たちに仕事を教えてあげる、リーダーの役になるの」
Russian (RU): "Да, ты на десять лет младше остальных, а значит, продержавшись до тех пор, пока не станешь того же возраста, что они, ты будешь гораздо опытнее новичков, которые придут позже. Даже господин Генджи признает твои таланты, и ты станешь лидером, способным обучать новых детей, приходящих из Дома Фукуин."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Você pode ser dez anos mais jovem que todo mundo, mas isso significa que, se continuar até alcançar a mesma idade que os outros tem hoje, você será muito mais experiente que as novas pessoas que vierem depois. Até o Genji‐sama vai reconhecer os seus talentos, assim você poderá ensinar às novas crianças que vierem da Casa Fukuin."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「儘管你比大家小了 10 歲。但這可是代表著，你若能在這努力工作到跟大家一樣的年紀，你就會變得遠遠要比新來的人，工作做得更好喲。並且還會獲得源次先生的認可，你將能當上教導從福音之家新來的人如何工作的領導哦。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「尽管你比大家小了 10 岁。但这可是代表着，你若能在这努力工作到跟大家一样的年纪，你就会变得远远要比新来的人，工作做得更好哟。并且还会获得源次先生的认可，你将能当上教导从福音之家新来的人如何工作的领导哦。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Puoi anche essere dieci anni più giovane di tutti gli altri, ma ciò significa che se continui fino a quando sarai della stessa età degli altri, avrai molta più esperienza delle nuove persone che verranno dopo. Anche Genji-sama riconoscerà i tuoi talenti, e diventerai una persona autorevole che può istruire i nuovi ragazzi che vengono dalla Fukuin House."

Speaker: Shannon
Steam (ST): "And then, I'm sure that everyone will respect you. By that time, even Madam, the Master, and Krauss-sama will acknowledge your skills. That's your future."
Umineko Project (UP): "And then, I'm sure that everyone will respect you. By that time, even Madam, the Master, and Krauss‐sama will acknowledge your skills. That's your future."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "And then, I'm sure that everyone will respect you. By that time, even Madam, the Master, and Krauss-sama will acknowledge your skills. That's your future."
PC Japanese (JP): 「そしてきっと、みんなに尊敬されるわ。その頃にはきっと奥様にも認められて、お館様や旦那様にも認められるようになってるよ。それが、あなたの未来。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「そしてきっと、みんなに尊敬されるわ。その頃にはきっと奥様にも認められて、お館様や旦那様にも認められるようになってるよ。それが、あなたの未来」
Russian (RU): "И тогда, я уверена, все зауважают тебя. К тому времени даже Господин, мадам и господин Краусс признают твои навыки. Вот каким будет твоё будущее."

Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「然後，你一定會受到大家的尊敬。在那時，你一定還得到了太太的認可，還獲得了老爺與主人的認可。這就是，你的未來。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「然后，你一定会受到大家的尊敬。在那时，你一定还得到了太太的认可，还获得了老爷与主人的认可。这就是，你的未来。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "E dopo, sono certa che tutti ti rispetteranno. A quel tempo, persino Madame, il Padrone, e Krauss-sama riconosceranno le tue abilità. Questo è il tuo futuro."

Steam (ST): "...You mean like the ugly duckling becoming a swan?"
Umineko Project (UP): "......You mean like the ugly duckling becoming a swan?"

Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "......Igual o patinho feio pode se tornar um cisne?"

Chinese Simplified (CN): 「……就像丑小鸭那样，成为白天鹅的未来？」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "... Intendi come il brutto anatroccolo che diventa un cigno?"

Speaker: Shannon
Steam (ST): "That might be it. After all, it was very unusual for you to be chosen as an Ushiromiya family servant. ...In fact, that rumor might be true, and you might be the secret child of someone in the Ushiromiya family. *giggle*."
Umineko Project (UP): "That might be it. After all, it was very unusual for you to be chosen as an Ushiromiya family servant. ......In fact, that rumor might be true, and you might be the secret child of someone in the Ushiromiya family. *giggle*."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): 「そうかもしれないね。だって、あなたが右代宮家の使用人に選ばれたのは、本当に不思議だもの。……ひょっとすると、本当にあなたは誰かが噂していたように、右代宮家の血筋を引く、誰かの隠し子かもしれないね。くす。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「そうかもしれないね。だって、あなたが右代宮家の使用人に選ばれたのは、本当に不思議だもの。……ひょっとすると、本当にあなたは誰かが噂していたように、右代宮家の血筋を引く、誰かの隠し子かもしれないね。くす」
Russian (RU): "Возможно. Ведь очень необычно, что тебя выбрали слугой семьи Уширомия. ......Кто знает, вдруг тот слух правдив, и ты действительно ребёнок члена семьи.*хи‐хи*."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Pode ser que sim. Afinal, foi natural que escolhessem você para ser serviçal da família Ushiromiya. ......Na verdade, aquele rumor pode ser verdade, e você pode ser a criança secreta de algum membro da família Ushiromiya. *risos*."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「說不定就是這樣呢。畢竟，你被選來當右代宮家的傭人，真的好叫人不可思議。……搞不好，你真的是如某人謠傳的那樣，是流著右代宮家的血的，誰的見不得光的孩子也說不定。嘻。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「说不定就是这样呢。毕竟，你被选来当右代宫家的佣人，真的好叫人不可思议。……搞不好，你真的是如某人谣传的那样，是流着右代宫家的血的，谁的见不得光的孩子也说不定。嘻。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Potrebbe essere. Del resto, è stato molto inusuale per te essere fra i domestici della famiglia Ushiromiya. ... In effetti, quella voce potrebbe essere vera, e qualcuno nella famiglia Ushiromiya potrebbe essere il tuo Padre segreto. *giggle*."

PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「………………。……はい。私は、これを何かの運命だと思いました。六軒島で生涯を終えられた九羽鳥庵のベアトリーチェさまの血が、この子に何かを託し、生き延びさせたに違いないと、そう思ったのです」
Russian (RU): ".........Да, вероятно, такова судьба. Я подумал, что госпожа Беатриче из Кувадориана, чья жизнь закончилась на Роккенджиме, передала этому ребёнку нечто, что спасло его."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ".................. ......Sim, eu pensei que era o destino. Eu pensei que o sangue da Beatrice‐sama da Kuwadorian, quem a vida chegou ao fim em Rokkenjima, pudesse ter transmitido algo àquela criança para fazê‐la sobreviver."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「………………。……是的。我認為，這是某種命運。我認為，無疑一定是在六軒島走完一生的九羽鳥庵的貝阿朵莉切小姐的血，將什麼托付給了這孩子，令這孩子活了下來。」

PC Japanese (JP): 「しかし源次は、赤ん坊が生き永らえたことを主人の金蔵には伝えなかった。不幸な事故で転落し死亡したと、短く伝えた。金蔵は嘆き悲しんだが、その嘆きは悲しみよりも狂気に彩られたものだった……。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「しかし源次は、赤ん坊が生き永らえたことを主人の金蔵には伝えなかった。不幸な事故で転落し死亡したと、短く伝えた。金蔵は嘆き悲しんだが、その嘆きは悲しみよりも狂気に彩られたものだった……」
Russian (RU): "Но Генджи не сказал Кинзо, своему господину, о том, что ребёнок выжил. Он просто сказал, что тот разбился насмерть в результате несчастного случая. Кинзо скорбел, но его траур был больше безумием, чем горем......"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Mas Genji ao seu mestre não contou, sobre aquela criança sobrevivido ter. Simplesmente comunicou que havia caído e a morte encontrado em um infortúnio acidente. Kinzo lamentou, mas tal lamento estava mais para loucura do que tristeza......"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「然而，源次並沒有把嬰兒活下來了的消息告訴金藏。簡短地講了，嬰兒因不幸的意外墜崖死亡。雖然金藏傷心哀嘆，但他的哀嘆中，瘋狂勝過了哀傷……」
